body.description: Enjoy the fine art of letter-writing and add flair to your correspondence -- take pen in hand and compose a letter to a friend or family member, using these pretty stationery sheets!Board box with clear acetate lid contains 30 sheets and 24 matching envelopes.Each crisp stationery sheet is imbued with a top-and-bottom palette of sorbet-colored hues, evocative of a tropical sunset.The design is replicated on the flaps of the matching envelopes.Sheet size: 5-3/4'' wide x 7-3/4'' high.Matches Peter Pauper Press's other Watercolor Sunset gifts and stationery. Read more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Watercolor Sunset Boxed Stationery Sheets Enjoy the fine art of letter writing with designer stationery sheets and matching envelopes

Add flair to your personal correspondence Beautiful design Each crisp stationery sheet is imbued with a top-and-bottom palette of sorbet-colored hues evocative of a tropical sunset. Board box with clear acetate lid contains 30 letter sheets and 24 matching envelopes. Superior stationery sheets Write with confidence. Substantial smooth-finish writing sheets take a variety of pens beautifully. Fountain pens glide over the page. 24 matching envelopes Our Watercolor Sunset design is replicated on the matching envelopes. Stationery envelopes are constructed of quality paper.

Beautiful stationery is a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten letter is warranted. Sheet size (5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high) allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch! About our Watercolor Sunset Letter-Perfect Stationery Sheets: Set comes with 30 designer letter sheets Includes 24 matching stationery envelopes Each sheet measures 5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high Stationery set comes in a sturdy matching box with a clear acetate lid Matches Peter Pauper Press's other Watercolor Sunset gifts and stationery.

Watercolor Sunset Thank You Notes (Stationery, Note Cards, Boxed Cards) Watercolor Sunset Large Address Book Watercolor Sunset Journal (Diary, Notebook) Watercolor Sunset Internet Address & Password Logbook (removable cover band) Watercolor Sunset Roller Ball Pen with Gift Box (Rollerball Pen) Watercolor Sunset Gift Bag

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter—and later, his wife, Edna—sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy—and our customers’ expectations—of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Their paper is always quality. I have purchased several different patterns, and none have disappointed me, yet.It works with my fountain pen, but the extra fine point nib is scratchy. I wouldn't use it for that small size again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive & boxed nicely.
reviews.reviewText: This attractive stationery was boxed nicely & was up to my expctations. I look forward to using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Great quality paper. Good weight. Will reorder again. Would love to have an envelope for each sheet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I loved the beautiful stationery, and the speedy service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I have always loved Peter Pauper for my writing paper. I have a lot of pen pals and they always love the paper as well.Perfectly boxed and neatly tucked inside. Thank you again for the pretty papers!
